amendment.description: Amendment prohibits economic assistance from being provided to any country that restricts U.S. humanitarian aid from being delivered.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 73 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996, to prohibit Turkey from receiving Economic Suppor Funds until that country agrees to lift its blockade of humanitarian assistance into Armenia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Visclosky amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 301 - 118, 1 Present (Roll no. 214).
